Cereal box as a birdhouse: Cut a small hole in the front of the box and paint it to attract birds.
Cereal box as a storage container: Use the box to store small items like toys, jewelry, or office supplies.
Cereal box as a fort: Cut out the windows and doors of the box and use it as a fort for children to play in.
Cereal box as a bookshelf: Cut the box into several shelves and use it to store books or other items.
Cereal box as a desk organizer: Use the box to organize your desk supplies like pens, pencils, erasers, and paper clips.
